name: learning process
description:
A sample erotica story about 2 girlfriends learning about the basics of toys and finishing their lesson at home

.............
"Who was that?" she cheerfully squealed to me.
"Ugh why are you excited its only David" I stated as I poured a cup of liquor and quickly drank it.
"Oh" she said mainly to herself. "Maybe we can teach him how to make you happier."
"What?
"Where are the toys, I can teach you and you can teach him"
"Oh" I said as I took another swig.

She quickly grabbed my bag that I tried so hard to secretly hide and she grabbed her bag and motioned for me to sit next to her.
By this time the alcohol hit me and I didnt even know it, so it took me a minute to stammer my way to the spot next to her on the couch.
When I finally made it to my destination, she pulled out the lube.
"Ever felt dry?" she asked.
"Yea"
"Well this helps that" she explained.............




Story will be emailed to you in pdf form....so please provide email when ordering.
